MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the SY24 postcode area of Borth, affecting properties in Bryngwyn Close and surrounding area. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of repairs required and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 4:30PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 2:42PM on 20th January 2021.
